translations: v．伪装，掩饰：为了隐藏真实身份或目的而假装成另一个人或事物。
· He masqueraded as a doctor to gain access to the hospital.
他伪装成医生以便进入医院。

sentences.sentence: He masqueraded as a doctor and fooled everyone.
sentences.translation: 他冒充医生，骗过了每一个人。

sentences.sentence: He was an imposter who masqueraded as a doctor.
The stowaway masqueraded as a crew member.
